Okay!

For you that have problem with at black screen and problems with the menus are cut off. Here is the solution.

Click on metroLL benchmark, there you can change your resolution and also other settings. I did that and also run a benchmark test and after that I could play the game without any problems!

You can also choose between DX11 and DX10, I tested to run the game with DX11 and is was laggy as hell, so run the game with DX10.


Hope that helps!
Just change the directory, yes you are missing your brain in your head.

Guide to installing more clearly.

1. Run setup.exe and choose the third option (you can install anywhere even though the default is the steam folder)

2. Copy over the NoDVD folder contents of the metroll.exe and steamapi.dll and steamrld

3. Run game (worked first time for me launched with no issues)

4. The game menu is in RUSSIAN, so to change to english go the the right most option in the main menu. The choose the second option, then you'll see some checkboxes and options that let you choose left and right, the first one of those is the language and just keep choosing till you hit english.

5. Enjoy and don't forget to download the latest drivers for your video card.

ok its not just me there is a huge problem with this game and amd cards with flickering shadows, many youtube video out with my same exact problem. but heres a fix!!  Navigate to %LOCALAPPDATA%4A GamesMetro LL and open user.cfg with text﻿ editor.
Locate line r_api 2 and change it to r_api 0 for DirectX 9 renderer.
Change user.cfg to read-only to prevent the game overwriting changes.

I had to use a translation app on my iPad to change the language in the game from Russian to English, but I got it to work, lol.  If the installation is Russian for you, make sure to hit the RU button to change it to English.  When you get to the main menu, try to use common knownlege from your years of playing video games to figure out where the language option is.  I think the Options menu was the 3rd from the left.  Either way, it's near the far right of the screen.  2nd or 3rd from the list, but you'll know you're in the right area when you see two sections of scroll arrows under a few check boxes.  The bottom one is voice language and the top is text.  The voice should already be set to English so just match the two words and back out of that to apply it.  It should work.
game works 100% thanks
Followed the instructions - Worked like a charm doing avg. 54 fps

English Text Instructions:

- Third to the right
- Press Enter/Mouse Click
- 2nd option from the top.
- Enter/Mouse Click
- Two options at the bottom. The one at the very bottom is already set to english voice overs. So make the one above it the same as that. Keep clicking the right arrow till it matches the one below it.

To those with issues, freezing or crashing, etc. Be aware that this is a very tough game to run on anything but top, current pc hardware. 

Weak or old graphics cards will likely have issues, as this is a very graphics intensive game. Even a gtx680 or hd7970 will have a tough time with it on max settings.
I hope there will be a patch soon to fix that Performance and screen tearing.

Some clarifications to people having questions/issues:

1- Game comes in all languages that steam is avalaible, to change the game language you need to edit the steam config file that comes in the nodvd folder in the downloaded folder. However, the installer is only available in RUSSIAN OR ENGLISH, NOT THE GAME.

2- If you're wondering about lag/fps go to www.canyourunit.com it will auto-scan your pc and tell you if you can, if you're below the recommended settings I wouldn't recommend playing this right now until a patch comes out, I have a i7-920 hd 5870 and 12gb ram and in some places I get 120 I turn around and can get anywhere from 5 to 20.

3 FOLLOW THE INSTRUCTION! IF YOU FOLLOW THEM IT WILL WORK:

1) Download the torrent.

2) Run setup.exe and install the game

3) Copy the contents of the folder NoDvD in the main game directory.

4) Play

TO MAKE THE GAME IN YOUR LANGUAGE GO INTO STEAM/STEAMAPPS/COMMON/METROLASTLIGHT AND EDIT steam_rld.ini (YOU SHOULD HAVE IT IF YOU FOLLOWED THE INSTRUCTION AND PASTED THE DATA FROM THE DOWNLOAD FOLDER). THEN SIMPLY REPLACE RUSSIAN BY YOUR LANGUAGE (ITALIAN, RUSSIAN, ENGLISH, ETC!)

To enable Hard Ranger Mode:
1: open regedit
2: Navigate to HKEY_CURRENT_USER/Software/FLT/Steam/43160
3: Create a new String value called ListOfInstalledDLC with Value data 222801
4: Open game - New game - Select Hard Ranger Mode
5: have fun

For the language problem, i fixed it on the first page of installation after opening the setup.exe. where it has the 3 buttons at the bottom: RU and 2 russian things. Just click RU and it changes to EN and becomes English.

works fine with update 4, after you click the install button...on the bottom left of the  install menu is a button that says "RU", if you click that it will change to "EN" and install in English, thank you uploader.

This torrent works fine. No you don't need Steam. When you see the "RU" button in the installer, click it and then it will say "EN". Just have it extract to a folder, it doesn't have to be in the steam folder.
Then copy over the stuff from the nodvd folder, modify the steam_rld.ini file to change the language to english and there you go. It is a standalone game (no registry entries).

Runs well. Only takes 8.55GiB installed and levels load surprisingly quickly for how complex this game is.  Barely runs on my G50VT laptop.

Issues; the sound echo affects sometimes are too abrupt. Also the wavy air from heat from your lighter and from pots and pans in the kitchen are way too pronounced.
